name: CRAFT Beer Market
address: CRAFT Beer Market Vancouver, 85 W 1st Ave, Vancouver, BC V5Y 3K8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: CRAFT Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Cheddar, gouda, mozzarella, swiss cheese, poblano peppers, house made cheese sauce, paprika-parsley breadcrumbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tenders
hasMenuItem.description: Corn flake crusted chicken tenders, beer salted french fries, honey mustard aioli.

hasMenuItem.description: Naturally raised chicken, avocado, bacon, white cheddar, lettuce, tomato, pickled red onion, ciabatta potato bun, parsley shallot aioli.

hasMenuItem.description: Ocean wise™, sustainably raised salmon, green beans, quinoa and almond pilaf, spicy chili garlic sauce, pineapple salsa.

review.reviewBody: Very tasty Chicken strips, fries and salad.

Consistently missing orders, I would recommend eating there as I cant say with confidence that if you order for more than a bag, will you get everything. Had to re order twice just to have my original order, redelivered to me.
Great food when they make the right items. The Baja Chicken Salad had no chicken :(
I like thete max and cheese 😂

Mac tastes weird 
Seasoning is not a good choice
